ch0092_41_iris/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, c’mon, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
We’d better hurry up and get to school!
ch0092_41_iris/0101_0701_02_10:
School’s so fun and exciting—even on the
way there!
ch0092_41_iris/7101_0701_01_10:
Back home in Opelucid City, Grandpa
Drayden would teach me all sorts of things!
ch0092_41_iris/7101_0701_02_10:
He taught me about battling, of course! But
he also taught me about Unova’s history and
living in the city!
ch0092_41_iris/7101_0701_03_10:
So really, Grandpa Drayden’s like a
teacher to me!
ch0092_41_iris/7102_0701_01_10:
Did you know Unova has a big school called
Blueberry Academy?
ch0092_41_iris/7102_0701_02_10:
They’ve got a League Club...with an
Elite Four AND a Champion!
ch0092_41_iris/7102_0701_03_10:
It’s so cool that they have a Pokémon League
at school!
ch0092_41_iris/7103_0701_01_10: Lapras has a beautiful singing voice!
ch0092_41_iris/7103_0701_02_10: It’s so nice, it puts me right to sleep!
ch0092_41_iris/7103_0701_03_10:
...I guess I should make sure Lapras
doesn’t sing during class!
ch0092_41_iris/7104_0701_01_10:
One of the fun things about school is getting
to wear a uniform!
ch0092_41_iris/7104_0701_02_10:
It’s kinda nice that everyone’s outfit
matches!
ch0092_41_iris/7105_0701_01_10:
School’s so fun, I start feeling kinda lonely
when it’s time to go home!
ch0092_41_iris/7105_0701_02_10: I just can’t wait for tomorrow to come!
ch0092_41_iris/7105_0701_04_10:
Heheh! We’re gonna have so much fun at
school!
ch0092_41_iris/1701_0701_01_10:
Here, you can have this! I hope it helps
with your battling and studying!
ch0092_41_iris/2501_0701_01_10: I’m good at sports AND studying!
ch0092_41_iris/2501_0701_02_10: So at school, you can count on me!
ch0092_41_iris/2501_0701_03_10:
Wait, you don’t believe me? But I swear I’m
telling the truth!
ch0092_41_iris/2501_0702_01_10: Hey! Didja see my report card?
ch0092_41_iris/2501_0702_02_10: See? Now you know I wasn’t lying! Hehehe!
ch0092_41_iris/2511_0701_01_10: Taking tests is exciting, isn’t it?
ch0092_41_iris/2511_0701_02_10:
It tests your strength...so it’s a lot like going
up against a Gym Leader or taking on a
Pokémon League, huh?
ch0092_41_iris/2511_0701_03_10:
I’m usually the one taking on challengers,
being Champion and all, so it’s kinda fun
being the one tested!
ch0092_41_iris/2511_0702_01_10: Getting things wrong on tests is frustrating...
ch0092_41_iris/2511_0702_02_10:
When that happens, you’ve just gotta study
more so you get a perfect score next time!
ch0092_41_iris/3001_0701_01_10:
I’m gonna let my Pokémon do some
sunbathing this morning, while the sun’s
nice and bright!
ch0092_41_iris/3003_0701_01_10:
It’s so bright outside! Makes me want to lie
down and soak up some sun with my
Pokémon!
ch0092_41_iris/3005_0701_01_10:
My granddad always said that 
children who sleep well grow well!
